title: Securities registration requirement
context: PART III. REGISTRATION OF SECURITIES AND NOTICE FILING OF FEDERAL COVERED SECURITIES [ยง485A-301] Securities registration requirement. It is unlawful for a person to offer or sell a security in this State unless: (1) The security is a federal covered security; (2) The security, transaction, or offer is exempted from registration under sections 485A-201 to 485A-203; or (3) The security is registered under this chapter. [L 2006, c 229, pt of ยง1]
